revised_title: Allan Watt Downie: A Pioneering Medical Researcher and Smallpox Expert
tldr: Allan Watt Downie was a talented medical researcher and virologist who made significant contributions to the understanding and eradication of smallpox. His work in epidemiology, laboratory diagnosis, and public health helped shape the final worldwide Smallpox Eradication Programme. Downie's dedication and expertise in the field made him a respected figure in the global medical community.
